command.text: select "arddital"."ln_no" "ln_no" ,"arddital"."countrdus" "countrdus" ,"Thecountrdus"."nasmok" "Thecountrdusnasmok" ,"ThecountrdusBrn_"."Brn_Nm" "ThecountrdusBrn_Brn_Nm" ,"Thecountrdusdoc_typ"."doc_name" "Thecountrdusdoc_typdoc_name" ,"Thecountrdustypcmsup"."SubledgerDescrption" "ThecountrdustypcmsupSubledgerDescrption" ,"ThecountrdusPym_"."Pymnt_Nm" "ThecountrdusPym_Pymnt_Nm" ,"ThecountrdusPym_pymnt_acc"."Acc_Nm" "ThecountrdusPym_pymnt_accAcc_Nm" ,"ThecountrdusPym_sgm"."sgm_Nm" "ThecountrdusPym_sgmsgm_Nm" ,"Thecountrduscur"."Curncy_Nm" "ThecountrduscurCurncy_Nm" ,"ThecountrdusCstm_"."Cstm_Nm" "ThecountrdusCstm_Cstm_Nm" ,"ThecountrdusCstm_Area"."Area_name" "ThecountrdusCstm_AreaArea_name" ,"ThecountrdusCstm_Evaluation"."Evaluation_name" "ThecountrdusCstm_EvaluationEvaluation_name" ,"ThecountrdusCstm_acc_"."Acc_Nm" "ThecountrdusCstm_acc_Acc_Nm" ,"ThecountrdusCstm_Cntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "ThecountrdusCstm_Cntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"ThecountrdusCstm_curncy_"."Curncy_Nm" "ThecountrdusCstm_curncy_Curncy_Nm" ,"ThecountrdusCstm_TSNEF"."TSNEF_name" "ThecountrdusCstm_TSNEFTSNEF_name" ,"ThecountrdusCstm_TSNEFNO1"."TSNEF1_name" "ThecountrdusCstm_TSNEFNO1TSNEF1_name" ,"ThecountrdusCstm_Slm_"."Slm_Nm" "ThecountrdusCstm_Slm_Slm_Nm" ,"ThecountrdusSlm_"."Slm_Nm" "ThecountrdusSlm_Slm_Nm" ,"ThecountrdusSlm_masngerclass"."masngerclass" "ThecountrdusSlm_masngerclassmasngerclass" ,"arddital"."ID_comp" "ID_comp" ,"TheID_comp"."ID_USER" "TheID_compID_USER" ,"TheID_comp"."ITEM" "ITEM" ,"TheID_compIDGROUP"."ID_USER" "TheID_compIDGROUPID_USER" ,"TheID_compSup_"."Item_name" "TheID_compSup_Item_name" ,"TheID_compid1"."DESCRP1" "TheID_compid1DESCRP1" ,"TheID_compid2"."DESCRP1" "TheID_compid2DESCRP1" ,"TheID_compid3"."DESCRP1" "TheID_compid3DESCRP1" ,"TheID_compid4"."DESCRP1" "TheID_compid4DESCRP1" ,"TheID_compid5"."DESCRP1" "TheID_compid5DESCRP1" ,"TheID_compid6"."DESCRP1" "TheID_compid6DESCRP1" ,"TheID_compid7"."DESCRP1" "TheID_compid7DESCRP1" ,"arddital"."Unit_No" "Unit_No" ,"Unit_"."Unit_Nm" "Unit_Unit_Nm" ,"arddital"."cost" "cost" ,"arddital"."quantity" "quantity" ,"arddital"."egmaly" "egmaly" ,"arddital"."Itm_Sal1" "Itm_Sal1" ,"arddital"."ModifiedBy" "ModifiedBy" ,"arddital"."ModifiedOn" "ModifiedOn" ,"arddital"."CreatedBy" "CreatedBy" ,"arddital"."CreatedOn" "CreatedOn" ,"arddital"."branch" "branch" ,"Thebranch"."Desc1" "ThebranchDesc1" ,"arddital"."carno" "carno" from "dbo"."arddital" "arddital" left join "dbo"."ardmast" "Thecountrdus" on "arddital"."countrdus" = "Thecountrdus"."countrdus" left join "dbo"."Branchcnst" "ThecountrdusBrn_" on "Thecountrdus"."Brn_No" = "ThecountrdusBrn_"."Brn_No" left join "dbo"."docard" "Thecountrdusdoc_typ" on "Thecountrdus"."doc_typ" = "Thecountrdusdoc_typ"."doc_typ" left join "dbo"."GLSubledgertyplist" "Thecountrdustypcmsup" on "Thecountrdus"."typcmsup" = "Thecountrdustypcmsup"."Subledgerid" left join "dbo"."Pymntype" "ThecountrdusPym_" on "Thecountrdus"."Pym_No" = "ThecountrdusPym_"."Pymnt_No" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "ThecountrdusPym_pymnt_acc" on "ThecountrdusPym_"."pymnt_acc" = "ThecountrdusPym_pymnt_acc"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "ThecountrdusPym_sgm" on "ThecountrdusPym_"."sgm" = "ThecountrdusPym_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."Stcurncy" "Thecountrduscur" on "Thecountrdus"."curcode" = "Thecountrduscur"."Curncy_No" left join "dbo"."Stcustmr" "ThecountrdusCstm_" on "Thecountrdus"."Cstm_No" = "ThecountrdusCstm_"."Cstm_No" left join "dbo"."AreaList" "ThecountrdusCstm_Area" on "ThecountrdusCstm_"."AreaNo" = "ThecountrdusCstm_Area"."AreaNo" left join "dbo"."EvaluationList" "ThecountrdusCstm_Evaluation" on "ThecountrdusCstm_"."EvaluationNO" = "ThecountrdusCstm_Evaluation"."EvaluationNO" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "ThecountrdusCstm_acc_" on "ThecountrdusCstm_"."acc_no" = "ThecountrdusCstm_acc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "ThecountrdusCstm_Cntry_" on "ThecountrdusCstm_"."Cntry_No" = "ThecountrdusCstm_Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Stcurncy" "ThecountrdusCstm_curncy_" on "ThecountrdusCstm_"."curncy_no" = "ThecountrdusCstm_curncy_"."Curncy_No" left join "dbo"."stcustmrtasnef" "ThecountrdusCstm_TSNEF" on "ThecountrdusCstm_"."TSNEFNO" = "ThecountrdusCstm_TSNEF"."TSNEFNO" left join "dbo"."stcustmrtasnef1" "ThecountrdusCstm_TSNEFNO1" on "ThecountrdusCstm_"."TSNEFNO1" = "ThecountrdusCstm_TSNEFNO1"."TSNEFNO1" left join "dbo"."Stslsman" "ThecountrdusCstm_Slm_" on "ThecountrdusCstm_"."Slm_No" = "ThecountrdusCstm_Slm_"."Slm_No" left join "dbo"."Stslsman" "ThecountrdusSlm_" on "Thecountrdus"."Slm_No" = "ThecountrdusSlm_"."Slm_No" left join "dbo"."masngerclass" "ThecountrdusSlm_masngerclass" on "ThecountrdusSlm_"."masngerclassid" = "ThecountrdusSlm_masngerclass"."masngerclassid" left join "dbo"."ITEMS" "TheID_comp" on "arddital"."ID_comp" = "TheID_comp"."ID_comp" left join "dbo"."GROUPStk" "TheID_compIDGROUP" on "TheID_comp"."IDGROUP" = "TheID_compIDGROUP"."IDGROUP" left join "dbo"."ItemList" "TheID_compSup_" on "TheID_comp"."Sup_No" = "TheID_compSup_"."ItemNo" left join "dbo"."PYHldtypsv1" "TheID_compid1" on "TheID_comp"."id1" = "TheID_compid1"."ID1" left join "dbo"."PYHldtypsv2" "TheID_compid2" on "TheID_comp"."id2" = "TheID_compid2"."ID2" left join "dbo"."PYHldtypsv3" "TheID_compid3" on "TheID_comp"."id3" = "TheID_compid3"."id3" left join "dbo"."PYHldtypsv4" "TheID_compid4" on "TheID_comp"."id4" = "TheID_compid4"."id4" left join "dbo"."PYHldtypsv5" "TheID_compid5" on "TheID_comp"."id5" = "TheID_compid5"."id5" left join "dbo"."PYHldtypsv6" "TheID_compid6" on "TheID_comp"."id6" = "TheID_compid6"."id6" left join "dbo"."PYHldtypsv7" "TheID_compid7" on "TheID_comp"."id7" = "TheID_compid7"."id7" left join "dbo"."Stunit" "Unit_" on "arddital"."Unit_No" = "Unit_"."Unit_No" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "Thebranch" on "arddital"."branch" = "Thebranch"."branch"

field.name: ThecountrdusPym_pymnt_accAcc_Nm
field.label: Thecountrdus Pym pymnt acc Acc Nm

businessRules.rule: DECLARE @execname nvarchar(max)= @Arguments_Controller + @Arguments_CommandName + 'After' exec ValidateRequestPost @execname exec @execname @countrdus,@ln_no,@ID_comp update arddital set branch =(select branch from ardmast where countrdus=@countrdus) where countrdus=@countrdus update arddital set carno = quantity where ln_no=@ln_no

DECLARE @execname nvarchar(max)= @Arguments_Controller + @Arguments_CommandName + 'After' exec ValidateRequestPost @execname exec @execname @countrdus,@ln_no,@ID_comp update arddital set branch =(select branch from ardmast where countrdus=@countrdus) where countrdus=@countrdus update arddital set carno = quantity where ln_no=@ln_no

DECLARE @execname nvarchar(max)= @Arguments_Controller + @Arguments_CommandName + 'After' exec ValidateRequestPost @execname exec @execname @countrdus,@ln_no,@ID_comp declare @carno1 real declare @quantity1 real set @carno1 = (select carno from arddital where ln_no=@ln_no) set @quantity1 = (select quantity from arddital where ln_no=@ln_no) if @carno1 < @quantity1 begin /* prevent the default action processing */ set @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 /* set the focus on the field and display an error */ set @Result_Focus = 'quantity,لا يجوز التعديل يمكنك اضافة صنف جديد' end
